name: Supersuperficial
description:
Have you ever wanted to be in the world of Superstudio's Supersurface? This probably won't get you all that close...

Exploring the notion of the counter-intuitive in the virtual space, this game places you in a simulation of Superstudio's world. The environment consists of only a gridded planar surface which extends infinitely. Walk (or choose to drive) on a never-ending journey with no destination.
